question: ‘DefExpo 2020’ was organized in which of the following cities of Uttar Pradesh?
explanation: ‘DefExpo 2020’ is the 11th biennial arms exhibition of the defence ministry. It was organized in Lucknow. The theme of ‘DefExpo 2020’ was “India: the emerging defence manufacturing hub’’. It is Asia’s biggest arm show which aimed at making Uttar Pradesh as one of the two important defence manufacturing hubs.
